FI.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
FI.description: The Mario Kart series’ first handheld outing is as fun, lightning-fast and crazy as ever! Mario Kart: Super Circuit takes the best elements of Super Mario Kart and Mario Kart 64, and turbo-charges them with 20 brand new tracks plus 20 classic tracks for experts to unlock. All the regular characters are here; including Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario and more; and your favourite items like Red Shells, Bananas and the much-feared Spiny Shell!

AT.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
AT.description: Der erste Auftritt der Mario Kart-Serie auf einem tragbaren Nintendo-System kommt so heiter-spaßig, ultraschnell und verrückt wie eh und je daher! Mario Kart: Super Circuit vereint die besten Elemente von Super Mario Kart und Mario Kart 64 und schaltet mit 20 brandneuen sowie 20 klassischen Strecken zum Freispielen noch einen Gang höher. Alle üblichen Verdächtigen sind mit dabei, darunter Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario und viele mehr, und ebenso deine beliebtesten Items wie Rote Panzer, Bananen und der gefürchtete Stachi-Panzer!

DE.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit

FR.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
FR.description: Attachez votre ceinture ! Le premier volet de la série des Mario Kart à être sorti sur console portable est ultra-rapide, fun et déjanté ! Mario Kart: Super Circuit reprend le meilleur de Super Mario Kart et Mario Kart 64, avec en plus 20 nouveaux circuits et 20 circuits classiques à débloquer. Aucun de vos personnages préférés ne manque à l'appel. Incarnez Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario et bien d'autres encore, et utilisez les bananes, les carapaces rouges et les redoutables carapaces à épines pour remporter la victoire !

ES.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
ES.description: ¡La primera experiencia en consola portátil de la colección de Mario Kart es la más divertida, frenética y alocada de todas! Mario Kart: Super Circuit brinda los mejores elementos de Super Mario Kart y Mario Kart 64, turbocargados con 20 circuitos nuevos más 20 clásicos que los corredores expertos podrán desbloquear. Vuelven los personajes que ya conoces como Mario, Luigi, Yoshi y muchos más, ¡además de tus objetos favoritos como caparazones rojos, plátanos y el temible caparazón de pinchos!

AU.name: Mario Kart: Super Circuit

IT.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
IT.description: La prima serie tascabile di Mario Kart è più divertente, dinamica e pazza che mai! Mario Kart: Super Circuit include tutte le caratteristiche migliori di Super Mario Kart e Mario Kart 64. Inoltre, venti nuovissimi circuiti, affiancati da altrettanti tracciati classici da sbloccare per i più esperti, danno al gioco una carica in più. Troverai tutti i personaggi appartenenti alla serie: Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario e molti altri ancora. Inoltre, ritroverai alcuni dei tuoi strumenti preferiti, come i gusci rossi, le banane e il temibile guscio spinoso!

PL.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
PL.description: The Mario Kart series’ first handheld outing is as fun, lightning-fast and crazy as ever! Mario Kart: Super Circuit takes the best elements of Super Mario Kart and Mario Kart 64, and turbo-charges them with 20 brand new tracks plus 20 classic tracks for experts to unlock. All the regular characters are here; including Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario and more; and your favourite items like Red Shells, Bananas and the much-feared Spiny Shell!

NL.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
NL.description: Deze eerste verschijning van de Mario Kart-serie op handheld is zo leuk, razendsnel en gestoord als ooit! Mario Kart: Super Circuit neemt de beste onderdelen van Super Mario Kart en Mario Kart 64 en gooit ze in een hogere versnelling met 20 gloednieuwe banen, plus 20 klassieke banen die vrij te spelen zijn voor experts. Alle reguliere personages zijn er; waaronder Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario en meer; en al je favoriete voorwerpen zoals rode schilden, bananen, en het veelgevreesde schild met stekels!

IE.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
IE.description: The Mario Kart series’ first handheld outing is as fun, lightning-fast and crazy as ever! Mario Kart: Super Circuit takes the best elements of Super Mario Kart and Mario Kart 64, and turbo-charges them with 20 brand new tracks plus 20 classic tracks for experts to unlock. TR.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
TR.description: The Mario Kart series’ first handheld outing is as fun, lightning-fast and crazy as ever! Mario Kart: Super Circuit takes the best elements of Super Mario Kart and Mario Kart 64, and turbo-charges them with 20 brand new tracks plus 20 classic tracks for experts to unlock. All the regular characters are here; including Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario and more; and your favourite items like Red Shells, Bananas and the much-feared Spiny Shell!

PT.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
PT.description: A primeira versão para uma consola portátil da série Mario Kart é a mais divertida, alucinante e louca de sempre! Mario Kart: Super Circuit aproveita os melhores elementos de Super Mario Kart e Mario Kart 64 e carrega-os com toda a potência em 20 novas pistas e 20 pistas clássicas a serem desbloqueadas por peritos. Estão presentes todas as personagens habituais, incluindo o Mario, o Luigi, o Wario e muitos mais, bem como os teus itens favoritos como as Red Shells, as Bananas e a tão temida Spiny Shell!

RU.name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
RU.description: Гонки Mario Kart на консоли — что может быть веселее и увлекательнее? Игра Mario Kart: Super Circuit совмещает лучшие элементы Super Mario Kart и Mario Kart 64. Игрокам предстоит освоить 20 новых трасс. Кроме того, профессиональные автогонщики смогут показать свое мастерство на 20 классических треках. На старте — все знакомые лица: здесь и Марио с Луиджи, и Йоши, и Варио, и множество других полюбившихся вам героев. Под рукой у вас будет привычный арсенал сюрпризов Mario Kart: красный панцирь, бананы, а также панцирь Колючкина, которого так боятся те, кто близок к победе!
